import * as React from "react"; import { AppData } from "./appdata"; import helpers from "./helpers"; class Menu extends React.Component { static displayName = "AppMenu"; static contextType = AppData; // ***** access via this.context //console.log() constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { currentTheme: "default", introVisible: null, menuVisible: null, myGlobalFunction: {}, toggleIntro: null }; //this.toggleTheme = this.toggleTheme.bind(this); //this.showMenu = this.showMenu.bind(this); } componentDidMount() {} componentWillUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {} componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState) {} render() { const { toggleMenu, toggleIntro, toggleTheme, toggleMap, toggleMe, togglePortfolio, easterEgg } = this.context; const resume = this.context.resume; return ( {context => { const pdfLink = process.env.PUBLIC_URL + "/assets/resume.pdf"; const menuActiveClass = context.menuVisible ? "contact-info active" : "contact-info"; const introActiveClass = context.introVisible ? "tooltip btfu active" : "tooltip btfu"; const mapActiveClass = context.mapVisible ? "mappy tooltip toggler active" : "mappy tooltip toggler"; const meActiveClass = context.meVisible ? "min-only me tooltip active" : "min-only me tooltip"; const portfolioActiveClass = context.portfolioVisible ? "tooltip sigh active" : "tooltip sigh"; const themeActiveClass = context.themed ? "theme-toggle tooltip toggler theme active" : "theme-toggle tooltip toggler theme"; return (
{ toggleMenu(e); }} >
